attributes.action: Scrap tuition fees and link payment to attendance.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We want a free, accessible to all, quality education. Based on student potential, freedom of choice and responsibilty. We beleive that this is achievable through these methods:
1.Education should be free at the point of delivery to students of all backgrounds. 

2.The system is based on student responsibilty. If a student does not attend, government contributions will be repaid.

3. As society as a whole benefits from further education this system would be financed through progressive taxation.
